name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full stack development, specializing in delivering high-performance applications in compliance-driven environments. Proficient in **Java**, **AWS**, **Spring**, **Spring Boot**, and **Hibernate**, leveraging robust technologies to build scalable solutions. Experienced in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines, utilizing **Docker** and **GitHub** for efficient code management and deployment.

Demonstrated leadership in developing client-server architectures and distributed systems, employing multithreading techniques to enhance performance. Recognized for strong problem-solving abilities and innovative approaches to software challenges, with hands-on expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms using **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **Flutter**. Well-versed in both frontend (React, Next.js, Vue) and backend (Node.js, FastAPI, Django) development, ensuring a holistic approach to application architecture.
